clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in alzheimer s disease

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: CTS 21166 produced a rapid and significant reduction of plasma amyloid beta a key biomarker that is believed to be involved in the pathogenesis of Alzheimer s disease CTS 21166 demonstrated excellent pharmacokinetic properties including dose proportional exposure and very low inter subject pharmacokinetic variability
